subject: Guest pitch: Nearly 10 years of copy trading, 335 YouTube videos
body:
Hi Aaron,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 — nearly 10 years — and have documented the entire journey across 335 YouTube videos.

I think my story could make an interesting episode for Chat With Traders:

- I started on eToro in 2016 and have stuck with copy trading through every market cycle since
- I've made every mistake in the book and learned from them on camera
- I have a unique perspective on what makes some copy traders consistently profitable vs those who blow up
- I can talk honestly about the realities of social trading — the good, the bad, and the ugly

My angle is different from most trading guests because I'm not selling a course or a system — I'm just a regular guy who's been doing this for nearly a decade and documenting it all.

Would love to chat if you think it's a fit.

Best,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://youtube.com/socialtrading
